divs: Sighting DetailsOn May 13, 2012, I witnessed a silver circular object hovering in the sky during broad daylight. The object was stationary for at least 10 minutes and then disappeared. I noticed the object when I was walking back from my car. I had no idea what the object was. The object just hovered in the sky. It was at least a mile away. I had no real feelings about this. I just kept looking. The object disappeared into thin air. It was there one second and then gone.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Sewickley
There was one other sighting in Sewickley on or around May 13th 2012
